## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                         | Description            |
| ---------------------------- | ---------------------- |
| `--c-badge-background-color` | Badge background color |
| `--c-badge-border-color`     | Badge border color     |
| `--c-badge-text-color`       | Badge text color       |
